channel.title: Chips with everything
channel.description: Chips with everything is our digital culture and technology podcast discussing what happens when people and tech collide. Each week Leigh Alexander and Olly Mann explore how our lives are affected, for both good and bad, by digital technologies, why we love and hate them in equal measure and how best to make sense of the rapid changes happening around us. We range from topics like Bernie Sander’s social media strategy to why comments and social media can make us rude and hateful monsters. How do you like your chips? Let us know how tech's affected your life via @guardianaudio
channel.itunes:author: theguardian.com
channel.itunes:summary: Chips with everything is our digital culture and technology podcast discussing what happens when people and tech collide. Each week Leigh Alexander and Olly Mann explore how our lives are affected, for both good and bad, by digital technologies, why we love and hate them in equal measure and how best to make sense of the rapid changes happening around us. We range from topics like Bernie Sander’s social media strategy to why comments and social media can make us rude and hateful monsters. How do you like your chips? Let us know how tech's affected your life via @guardianaudio
